com.st.olm.cq.sling.models

Class STUser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.st.olm.cq.sling.models.STUser
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    STProfile

    public class STUser
extends Object
    Represents the currently logged in user and allows for getting the personalization values for the current user.
    Author:
    dklco

        Returns:
